item.Q:
Write the character:

2: draw a line
item.A:
划 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 劃
1: huà 2: huá
计划 (計劃) jìhuà plan; project; program; to plan; to map out 有计划 (有計劃) yǒujìhuá to have plans

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to undertake; to carry; to shoulder; to take responsibility
2: a picul (100 catties, 50 kg.); two buckets full
item.A:
traditional: 擔
1: dān 2: dàn
担任 (擔任) dānrèn to hold a governmental office or post; to assume office of; to take charge of; to serve as 担子 (擔子) dànzi load; a carrying pole and the loads on it

item.A:
nǔ
